items.raw_string: Name of donor: All-Party Parliamentary Group for the Polar Regions (with sponsorship from the Prince Albert II of Monaco Foundation and the Mamont Foundation)Address of donor: House of Commons, London SW1A 0AAEstimate of the probable value (or amount of any donation): economy class return flight £460.20; accommodation and food £449.63; travel around Svalbard £454.21; total £1364.04Destination of visit: Svalbard, NorwayDates of visit: 28 August – 1 September 2017Purpose of visit: To visit British scientists at the NERC Arctic Research station in Ny-Ålesund and learn more about Britain’s contribution to polar science.(Registered 06 September 2017)
